mapper.select: select * from bill where 1=1 and billId = #{billId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BILL ( billId, roomId, renterId, period, rentalPrice, total, billDt, oldElecVal, newElecVal, oldWaterVal, newWaterVal, updDt, creDt, creUsrId, updUsrId) VALUES ( #{billId}, #{roomId}, #{renterId}, #{period}, #{rentalPrice}, #{total}, #{billDt}, #{oldElecVal}, #{newElecVal}, #{oldWaterVal}, #{newWaterVal}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{creUsrId}, #{updUsrId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE roomId = #{roomId}, renterId= #{renterId}, period = #{period}, rentalPrice = #{rentalPrice}, total = #{total}, billDt = #{billDt}, oldElecVal = #{oldElecVal}, newElecVal = #{newElecVal}, oldWaterVal = #{oldWaterVal}, newWaterVal = #{newWaterVal}, updDt = SYSDATE(), updUsrId = #{updUsrId}
